Interface IPersonDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersonDao

    public interface IPersonDao
    Author:
    Alexandre Leonardi Manages accesses to the database

      void clearPersons()
      Clears table PERSONS - the version to clear GROUPS is not exposed because it is dangerous for the base's integrity

      • findAllGroups

        java.util.List<Group> findAllGroups()
        Finds all groups in base
        Returns:

      • findAllPersons

        java.util.List<Person> findAllPersons(long groupId)
        Finds all persons that are part of a given group
        Parameters:
        groupId - the group of which we want the members
        Returns:
        a list the members of this group

      • findGroup

        Group findGroup(long id)
         throws GroupDoesNotExistException
        Finds a given group
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the group to be found
        Returns:
        the group
        Throws:
        GroupDoesNotExistException - if no group with such id exists

      • findPerson

        Person findPerson(long id)
           throws PersonDoesNotExistException
        Finds a given person based on his id
        Parameters:
        id - the person's id
        Returns:
        the searched person
        Throws:
        PersonDoesNotExistException - thrown when a person with a PersonId=id doesn't exist

      • findPersonByEmail

        Person findPersonByEmail(java.lang.String email)
                  throws PersonDoesNotExistException
        Finds a given person based on his email address
        Parameters:
        email - the person's email address
        Returns:
        the searched person
        Throws:
        PersonDoesNotExistException - thrown when a person with a Email=email doesn't exist

      • savePerson

        void savePerson(Person p)
         throws InvalidPersonException
        Saves or, if already present, modifies a person
        Parameters:
        p - the person to be modified or saved in base
        Throws:
        InvalidPersonException - if the person does not fill required fields, or with unauthorized values

        Parameters:

        void clearTables()
        Clears all tables in a controlled way that avoids integrity issues

      • clearPersons

        void clearPersons()
        Clears table PERSONS - the version to clear GROUPS is not exposed because it is dangerous for the base's integrity

        boolean personExists(long id)
        Checks if a person exists
        Parameters:
        id - the person to be checked
        Returns:
        true if and only if the person exists false otherwise

      • groupExists

        boolean groupExists(long id)
        Checks if a group exists
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • deletePerson

        void deletePerson(long id)
           throws PersonDoesNotExistException
        Deletes a given person
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the person to be deleted
        Throws:
        PersonDoesNotExistException - if trying to delete a person that is not present in base
